div.p: Group 1 Mapping from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/EncounterHistory|5.0.0 to unspecified code system

tr.td: FHIR R5 Resource `EncounterHistory` is representable via FHIR R4 Resource `Encounter`. Element `EncounterHistory` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter`.
Element `EncounterHistory.meta` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter.meta`.
Element `EncounterHistory.implicitRules` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter.implicitRules`.
Element `EncounterHistory.language` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter.language`.
Element `EncounterHistory.text` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter.text`.
Element `EncounterHistory.contained` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter.contained`.

Note that there is an externally-defined extension that has been flagged as the representation of FHIR R5 element `EncounterHistory.encounter` with an unmapped Reference type: `http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/alternate-reference`. Element `EncounterHistory.encounter` is will have a context of Encounter based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Encounter`.
Element `EncounterHistory.identifier` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter.identifier`.

Note that the target element context `Encounter.status` is a modifier element, so this extension does not need to be defined as a modifier. Element `EncounterHistory.status` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter.status`.
Element `EncounterHistory.class` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter.class`.
Element `EncounterHistory.type` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter.type`.
Element `EncounterHistory.serviceType` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter.serviceType`.
Element `EncounterHistory.subject` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter.subject`.
Element `EncounterHistory.subjectStatus` is will have a context of Encounter based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Encounter`.
Element `EncounterHistory.actualPeriod` is will have a context of Encounter based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Encounter`.
Element `EncounterHistory.plannedStartDate` is will have a context of Encounter based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Encounter`.
Element `EncounterHistory.plannedEndDate` is will have a context of Encounter based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Encounter`.
Element `EncounterHistory.length` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter.length`.
Element `EncounterHistory.location` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter.location`.
Element `EncounterHistory.location.location` is mapped to FHIR R4 element `Encounter.location.location`.
Element `EncounterHistory.location.form` is will have a context of Encounter.location based on following the parent source element upwards and mapping to `Encounter`.

title.value: Cross-version ConceptMap for FHIR R5 resources in FHIR R4

description.value: This ConceptMap represents the cross-version mapping of resource FHIR R5 for use in FHIR R4.
